name: BBEdit Shell Worksheet File
summary: Learn about .WORKSHEET files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The BBEdit shell worksheet component is similar to the older Macintosh Programmer's Workbench (MPW).

description: Developer file created by BBEdit, a Mac OS X source code development program; stores an interactive programmer worksheet, which can save source code text as well as execute commands in-line while editing; used for adding Unix command line features to source code development.
